description:
A Gundam-type mobile suit based on the http://anidb.net/ch125029 [Gundam Lfrith Pre-Production Model], which was developed by the http://anidb.net/ch133226 [Ochs Earth Corporation] before the Vanadis Incident. It has been provided to the http://anidb.net/ch131851 [Dawn of Fold], an anti-Spacian organization active on Earth.
Source: Official page
name: EDM-GA-01 Gundam Lfrith Ur
